data.text: @rudyardg Weak leadership leads to bad times.
@rudyardg World economic forum. This is not conspiracy theory stuff.

@rudyardg Putin has had 20+ years to crystalize his ambitions and work towards them and also for oligarchs appetites to increase. Got to feed the machine as well as your dreams of a once again great Russian empire.

@rudyardg It is irresponsible leadership that only knows how to govern in crisis mode rather than govern peace. Each crisis forces new bad decisions that creates the next crisis. Plus we have vain leadership that wants drama because they think they are TV actors.
